label: 五戒
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The five commandments are basic precepts for lay disciples:  not to kill, not to steal, not to commit adultery, not to lie, and not to drink intoxicating liquors (p. 497n).
